thread.section_title: Premier Inn London City (Aldgate) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good standard
thread.title_full: Good standard - Review of Premier Inn London City (Aldgate) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Ebe S
title: Good standard
text: The building was very nice and was very accessible but is located on a side street and close to Aldgate East station. The hotel has a great breakfast which we really enjoyed and the rooms have lately been refurbished which are very pleasant and nice. The beds wasn't that comfy but overall it was a good place to stay I highly recommend this
